name: Gobblin's Goblins
description: Colette's fare has taken a turn for the worse since you've left, but the smells have managed to attract a horde of goblins who find the smell irrestible!

name: The Plaguerider
description: Plaguerider Skar has invaded Glenfort, bringing with him an army of filth and pestilience. Gather your Guild and slay him!

name: Lockbolt's Reign
description: The rogue andit leader has a bounty on his head. Gather your guild and venture into the Ebian Forest, where goblins, beasts and bandits await!

name: Wrath of the Overseer
description: The long-dead overseer of the Cursed Quary has risen from his grave, resurrecting an army of slaves to do his bidding. Slay this fiend's army before it can threaten Glenfort!

name: Risen from the Depths
description: Exiled Necromancers have joined with the Rath'een to bring the accursed Dark Kraken back to Glenfort. Slay these factions before their evil works are complete!

name: Attack at Dawn
description: General Zuur of the Urgresh goblin tribes is raising an army to attack Glenfort. Gather your guild together and attack his garrosin at dawn!

name: Crypt of Corruption
description: The spirit of Dark Lord Helion has corrupted the spirit of a long forgotten Eldritch Guardian and attracted a horde of undead! Clear out this threat!

name: Dark Lord Helion
description: Lord Helion has risen from the darkest void, aiming to enslave all of Glenfort. Gather your guild and send the undead mage lord back into the void!
phases: ? waves, boss, Lord Helion? exact name?

name: Cursed Keep
description: A magical experiment has gone horribly wrong in Dragonmoor, summoning all manner of evil creatures! Assemble your guild and clear the cursed keep!

name: Vale of the Ice Dragon
description: The Frozen Vale has brought a storm of hail and snow to Glenfort. Investigate this strange new land and stem the darkness emanating from within.

name: Forgotten Sentinels (retired)
description: This raid has been retired for a few years now. It sure was fun, but the Queen Bogworm you can still slay in War of Fellmarsh, because she moved.
phases: boss: purple boss guy from that tower in Fellmarsh?

name: War of Fellmarsh
description: The Rath'een leader, Trask, is being controlled by evil forces from beyond our world. The time has come for your guild to dethrone the cursed emperor!

name: Horde of the Goblin King
description: The Goblin King's hordes must be dispersed if we are ever to reach the Vile Gate! Destroy his army and clear the path!

name: Battle of the Vile Gate
description: The Lord of Blades and his minions must be defeated. PRepare for war and march upon the Vile Gate!

name: Karnak's Final Stand
description: Karnak has somehow returned and is rallying his Sarkisian minions in an attempt to reverse Majerio's sealing hex on the Shattered Plane. March into the plane and drive him back to into the abyss, before he enters our world!

name: Hunted in the Mists
description: After years of being the alpha predators of the Vile Realm, your recent incursion into these lands has enraged the beasts of the Mistwalker Woodlands!

name: Legacy of Blades
description: You've freed the spirits of many fallen warriors, but the two most potent spirits remain. End the legacy of the forgotten Blademasters and put their tormented souls to rest!
phases: 335 waves, boss, Prince of Blades + Sedalb fo Drol

name: Crystallized Vengeance
description: Your long campaign across the Vile Realm has led to this singular moment. The time has come for you to venture forth and destroy Caliban once and for all.

name: Primal Mysteries
description: Your quest begins at the spot where these rare and strange beasts were last sighted. You are quickly set upon by hordes of Vile beasts.
phases: 652 waves, enemies, Vile beasts amongst Vile Bores
489 waves, enemies, kind of keepers Servant of the Ancient, Eternal, Righteous and Pure, two at the same time

name: Rise of the Spider Queen
description: Deep within the Vile Realm, the hard-won peace has been shattered by the return of Sha'lyn. Gather your guild and end her reign of terror!
phases: 306, boss, Sha'lyn; The Spider Queen, Onslaught 10e each

name: The Shadow Returns
description: The Hunter has returned. an army of VIle Realm soldiers before him and possessing a talismanthat bestows terrifying eldritch powers. Gather your guild and destroy them!
phases: 245 waves, boss, The Hunter, Onslaught 10e each
326 waves, boss, The Eldritch Hunter, Onslaughter 10e each
